Optical Medieval Music Recognition for All

A modular pipeline for the automatic transcription of medieval music notation

Learn MoreTry it out

Complete Digital Pipeline

OMMR4all provides a full suite of tools from manuscript image preprocessing to editable digital chant encodings in MEI format.

Specialized for Medieval Notation

It is optimized for square notation and suited for other notations.

Modular and Open Source

each module (detection, transcription, correction) can be used independently and integrated into your own workflows.
